name: Bunnyrot
description:
3 bunnies get stranded in a town full of zombies, created accidentally by the government when trying to create a parasyte that will allow them to make weaponized supersoldiers, but the experiment fails and the parasyte escapes.

You can play as Easter, Armand or Bonnie (Low speed, high damage, high health). 

High speed, Med damage, Low health Med speed, ranged attack with high damage, med speed (Low speed, med/high damage, high health) If you wish to follow the game's development more closely, you can join my discord server here: https://discord.gg/hAKxyWj
